Ready for kindergarten? Sign your child up for success at Steel Valley School District. Registration is now open for kindergarten classes. Enroll today to be part of the class of 2034!
At Steel Valley School District, the safety of our students, staff and the community is our highest priority. Please remember to practice social distancing.
Don’t worry, we are all in this together.

Thank you to all Steel Valley’s food services staff! Throughout the last week, the district’s staff have worked together to make sure that students are fed. Last week, more than 1,300 meal bags were served. Thank you for supporting our families and community.

Schools may be closed, but the Ironmen continue to stand tall for their community. Grab ‘n’ go lunches will continue to be served at Steel Valley High School and Barrett Elementary School from 10:00 am to noon Monday through Friday. Every day, the district provides hundreds of meals to students in our community. Read more in the Tube City Almanac.
For new notices, messages and information about Steel Valley's on-line learning go to Distance Learning located in Quick Links.

At Steel Valley, the Ironmen stand strong. During these unprecedented times, there is no playbook. Nevertheless, we are dedicated to serving our community. We are currently working with a variety of organizations to distribute information and resources. Check back for updates.

div.p: Testimonial

My School Rocks!!!! I love the Teachers, Principals, Labs, Clubs, Teams and the Technology. My brother keeps telling me, "I wish they had all that stuff when I was there, you're lucky they give you all this Technology to learn with". I do miss my middle school but high school has opened up my eyes to writing my own future. Watch out, here I come!!
